com.rift.coad.lib.deployment
Class DeploymentLoader.ClassLoaderLookup

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.DeploymentLoader.ClassLoaderLookup
Enclosing class:
DeploymentLoader
public static class DeploymentLoader.ClassLoaderLookup
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for supplying a lookup mechanism for stub code files based on the class loader that loaded them.

Method Summary
protected  void addClassLoader(DeploymentLoader loader)
          This method adds a class loader to the list.
 java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoaderByFileName(java.lang.String name)
          This method return the class loader identified by the file name
static DeploymentLoader.ClassLoaderLookup getInstance()
          This method returns a singleton reference and creates one if it does not exist.
 java.lang.String getStubCodeForLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader loader)
          This method returns the stub code name for the supplied loader.
protected  void removeClassLoader(DeploymentLoader loader)
          This method removes an entry from the class loader map.
